services.title: APIs
services.description: Web APIs (Application Programming Interface) allow data to be shared between applications, publicly or privately, over the Internet.

services.title: <acronym title="Software as a service">SaaS</acronym>
services.description: Web applications can offer sophisticated functionality without the need to have specific computer software loaded on the end-users PC.
